description:
The classic Universal Teva's, tweaked for performance on the trails. A tough sole ensures traction in the dirt or water, and an anti-odour treatment resists smells when worn for days on end.Repreve® polyester webbing made from recycled plastic bottles.Secure hook-and-loop closures.Ariaprene® synthetic foam footbed.Microban® antimicrobial treatment keeps sandals fresh.Vibram® MegaGrip rubber outsole sticks to wet and dry surfaces.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content
name: Teva Universal Trail Sandals - Men's
